result.title: MindCoding 2017
result.content:
Hello everyone!

We are happy to announce you that today is the 1st MindCoding round for both Div.1 and Div.2. MindCoding is a high-performing international coding competition, structured in 4 online rounds & 1 final stage, that'll take place in Cluj-Napoca, Romania, between 28th-30th of April 2017.

Today's round will last 90 minutes, enough time for the contestants to solve 4 programming challenges. Each of those 4 problems will have a score ranging between 100 and 1000, which decreases with time. So we encourage you to choose the best strategy and enjoy the contest.

The total score to be counted towards qualification in the final round will be computed as the sum of each participant's score in all the Div. 1 rounds they competed in. Only the following will take part in the final round : 15 non pupils contestants from outside ClujNapoca, 5 pupils from outside Cluj-Napoca, 20 non pupils contestants from Cluj-Napoca, 10 pupils from Cluj-Napoca & 5 international contestants.

In the end, after the 4 qualification rounds and the 2 final onsite ones, the fastest & most skilled of the participants are rewarded, existing 10 money prizes.

This year's contest is organized by:

Cosmin Rusu (cr.rusucosmin) — project coordinator

Sergiu Pușcaș (Sergiu)

Marius Gavrilescu (mgv) — the creator of our platform

Gabriel Ineluș (gabrielinelus)

Bianca Costin (o_mic)

Casian Marc (marccasiannicolae)

Alexandru Ionita (juve45)

Camelia Hanes (gcatdrey)

Bereczki Norbert (bnorbertcristian)

George Linut (Browser007)

Alexandru Vasiu (alex.vasiu)

Registration is open on : http://mindcoding.ro/account . The round will take place on the same site.

Find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/mindcodingcluj/ .

We are waiting for you to accept the MindCoding challenges, have fun, develop your skills and win prizes!
